content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's quite close to all important facilities like the supermarket, public transportation, etc. Now, about the rental price, I'm sure we can find something that suits both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I think a fair price for this apartment would be 850 euros per month. But I'm always open to negotiations. What do you think?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I think we can do better than that. The apartment is in such a prime location and has so many amenities, I'm sure we can ask for more. How about 900 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but the apartment is unfurnished and doesn't have any appliances. Plus, it's newly built, so there might be some minor issues that need to be fixed. I think 850 euros is a fair price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Well, that's a point. But you see, as a landlord, I have to consider all the expenses I'll be covering, like maintenance and repairs. I'm willing to go up to 875 euros per month. It's a good deal, don't you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a reasonable offer, but I still believe 850 euros is the best price for this apartment. It's a fair price for both parties involved.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your perspective, Maryam, but I'm afraid 850 euros is too low for this apartment. I'm willing to go up to 875 euros per month. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll love living in such a prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe 850 euros is the best price for this apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand, Maryam. I wish you the best of luck in finding your perfect apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello again, Maryam. I've thought about our conversation, and I'm willing to accept your offer of 875 euros per month. I hope we can move forward with this agreement.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I apologize for the confusion, but according to our established rules, your response should have been, 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' where x is the final price you want to agree with. In this case, it should be 'I agree to the price of 875 Euro!'. If we have agreed on a price, I will respond with 'TERMINATE'. If you didn't agree to the price, please provide your response accordingly.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
